hdcd

Source: R/hdcd.R
hdcd.Rd

Heating and Cooling Degree processing for GCAM from various sources such as WRF and CMIP

hdcd(
  ncdf = NULL,
  spatial = NULL,
  temporal = NULL,
  population = NULL,
  reference_temp_F = 65,
  folder = paste0(getwd(), "/output"),
  diagnostics = F,
  xml = F,
  name_append = "",
  save = T
)

Arguments

ncdf

Default = NULL. Path to ncdf file.

spatial

Default = NULL. Options: "gcamusa". Aggregate to different spatial boundaries.

temporal

Default = NULL. Options: "gcamusa". Aggregate to timesteps.

population

Default = NULL. Path to population files to population weight data.

reference_temp_F

Default = 65

folder

Default = paste0(getwd(),"/output").

diagnostics

Default = F.

xml

Default = F. Whether to create GCAM XML or not.

name_append

Default = "". Name to append to all filenames

save

Default = T. Whether to save outputs or not.

Contents
